rules_text:
Whenever Scorn deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard that many cards.
Symbiosis {2}{U} [i](Pay {2}{U} as a sorcery to transform this and attach it to target creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](Pay {2}{U} as a sorcery to unattach this. Transform it when it isn't attached.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard that many cards.”
